TypeSignature.Value: public class CollectionNavigationBuilder<TEntity,TRelatedEntity> : Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.CollectionNavigationBuilder where TEntity : class where TRelatedEntity : class
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CollectionNavigationBuilder`2<class TEntity, class TRelatedEntity> extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.CollectionNavigationBuilder
Public Class CollectionNavigationBuilder(Of TEntity, TRelatedEntity) Inherits CollectionNavigationBuilder

Docs.typeparam: The entity type to be configured.
The entity type that this relationship targets.

summary.para: Provides a simple API for configuring a relationship where configuration began on an end of the relationship with a collection that contains instances of another entity type.
Instances of this class are returned from methods when using the API and it is not designed to be directly constructed in your application code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.ReferenceCollectionBuilder`2<!TEntity, !TRelatedEntity> WithOne(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression`1<class System.Func`2<!TRelatedEntity, !TEntity>> navigationExpression) cil managed
Public Overridable Function WithOne (navigationExpression As Expression(Of Func(Of TRelatedEntity, TEntity))) As ReferenceCollectionBuilder(Of TEntity, TRelatedEntity)

Docs.param: A lambda expression representing the reference navigation property on the other end of this relationship (post => post.Blog). If no property is specified, the relationship will be configured without a navigation property on the other end of the relationship.
Docs.summary: Configures this as a one-to-many relationship.
Docs.returns: An object to further configure the relationship.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.ReferenceCollectionBuilder`2<!TEntity, !TRelatedEntity> WithOne(string navigationName) cil managed
Public Overridable Function WithOne (Optional navigationName As String = null) As ReferenceCollectionBuilder(Of TEntity, TRelatedEntity)

Docs.param: The name of the reference navigation property on the other end of this relationship. If null, there is no navigation property on the other end of the relationship.
Docs.summary: Configures this as a one-to-many relationship.
Docs.returns: An object to further configure the relationship.
